title: Journey through the universe in Gunther Hasinger’s new book (The University of Hawaii System)
text: ( Source : The University of Hawaii System ) When observing the sky on a very clear, dark night, the soft glow of the Milky Way with its thousands of stars can be seen with the naked eye. Over the centuries since Galileo Galilei first pointed
